class_notes: This section is for MN semester 2 students only.
course_description: This course focuses on the professional practice of psychiatric mental health nursing. Knowledge and skill essential to care for the mental health of patients, families, and communities across multiple care settings will be addressed.
schedule_location: MF 10:30am-12:20pm in Nursing Learning Ctr, Rm 225
